section_highlights.title: Planning and Building Disaster Recovery Solutions
section_highlights.description: This course introduces the concepts of disaster recovery and high availability and how they relate to IBM Cloud.

tiles.title: You can now automate complex recovery workflows through the improved GUI interface, reducing manual intervention and minimizing Recovery Time Objectives (RTO).
The DR Orchestrator (KSYS) now supports high availability in additional regions, enabling continuous operations during failover.
DR Automation now supports IBM Power E1080 (9080-HEX) systems with up to 64 TB of memory, allowing for recovery of large-scale workloads.
Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) configurations and private endpoint support have been enhanced, ensuring better data security and regulatory compliance.
